metadata.title: CVE-2016-3957 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The secure_load function in gluon/utils.py in web2py before 2.14.2 usespickle.loads to deserialize session information stored in cookies, whichmight allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code by leveragingknowledge of encryption_key.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-3957` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-gluon - 2.12.3-1ubuntu0.1
python-web2py - 2.12.3-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: web2py package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.12.3-1ubuntu0.1').
